title: 29th memorial of late President Premadasa commemorated
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The 29th memorial ceremony of the late President Ranasinghe Premadasa was commemorated today (01).
A floral tribute was paid to the statue of the late President Ranasinghe Premadasa near the Hulftsdorp Courts Complex.
Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa, Hema Premadasa, family members and others were present at the venue.
Kandy to GotaGoGama – Military veteran on a journey in a wheelchair
